org.restlet.ext.oauth

Class OAuthException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.restlet.ext.oauth.OAuthException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in next minor release.

    @Deprecated
public class OAuthException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception that represents OAuth 2.0 (RFC6749) Errors.
    Author:
    Shotaro Uchida
    See Also:
    The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework (RFC6749), Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • OAuthException

        public OAuthException(OAuthError error,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String errorUri)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        error - The OAuth error.
        description - The description of the exception.
        errorUri - The URI of the resource that gives more details about the error.

    • Method Detail

      • toOAuthException

        public static OAuthException toOAuthException(Form parameters)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a new OAuthException based on the given parameters. It especially looks for the given parameters:
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR for the kind of Exception (see OAuthError for the supported values),
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR_DESC for the description,
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR_URI for the URI of a documentation resource.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters used to set up the OAuthException.
        Returns:
        A new instance of OAuthException.

      • toOAuthException

        public static OAuthException toOAuthException(org.json.JSONObject json)
                                       throws org.json.JSONException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a new OAuthException based on the JSON payload. It especially looks for the given parameters:
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR for the kind of Exception (see OAuthError for the supported values),
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR_DESC for the description,
        OAuthResourceDefs.ERROR_URI for the URI of a documentation resource.
        Parameters:
        json - The JSON object used to set up the OAuthException.
        Returns:
        A new instance of OAuthException.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • toOAuthException

        public static OAuthException toOAuthException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a new OAuthException based on the given exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception.
        Returns:
        A new instance OAuthException.
